comment: The class of sets verifying a property is the empty class if and only if that property is a contradiction. See also ~ abn0 (from which it could be proved using as many essential proof steps but one fewer syntactic step, at the cost of depending on ~ df-ne ). (Contributed by BJ, 19-Mar-2021.)
